code: import{api}from'./api';class DataService{async getSchema(){const response=await api.get('/api/data/schema');return response;}async getQueries(params){const queryParams=new URLSearchParams();if(params.search)queryParams.append('search',params.search);if(params.page)queryParams.append('page',params.page.toString());if(params.pageSize)queryParams.append('page_size',params.pageSize.toString());if(params.filters)queryParams.append('filters',JSON.stringify(params.filters));const endpoint="/api/data/queries".concat(queryParams.toString()?"?".concat(queryParams.toString()):'');const response=await api.get(endpoint);return response;}async getAnalytics(){const response=await api.get('/api/data/analytics');return response;}async getTableDetails(tableName){const response=await api.get("/api/data/table/".concat(tableName));return response;}}export const dataService=new DataService();
